config.query: SELECT i.FKSKU as SKU_ID, sc.IMAGE_STYLEID as STYLE_ID, i.FKSTORENO as STORE_ID, i.CHECKIND, i.QOH, i.QOHSELLABLE, i.QOHNOTSELLABLE, i.QOO, i.QBO, i.QIT, i.QIP, i.LASTMODIFIEDDATE, i.INV_FKORGANIZATIONNO FROM VSTORE.SKUINVENTORY i INNER JOIN (SELECT SKUCOLOR, PKSKU FROM VSTORE.SKU) s ON i.FKSKU = s.PKSKU INNER JOIN ELCAT.STYLE_COLOURS sc ON SUBSTR(sc.STYLEID,1,8) = i.INV_FKSTYLENO AND sc.COLOUR_ID = s.SKUCOLOR WHERE i.LASTMODIFIEDDATE >= sysdate - interval '15' minute
